title: Chatrapati Shivaji's Daring Escape from Agra

chapters.title: The Arrest in Agra
chapters.description: Explore the circumstances that led to Chatrapati Shivaji being held under guard in Agra by Aurangzeb.

chapters.title: Strategic Planning
chapters.description: Learn how Shivaji and his loyal followers devised a clever plan to escape their confinement.

chapters.title: The Ingenious Execution
chapters.description: Witness the daring and brilliant implementation of the escape plan, involving disguises and clever tactics.

chapters.title: The Victorious Return
chapters.description: Celebrate Shivaji's successful return to his homeland, reaffirming his resilience and leadership.
